hero.title: Infinity Cheer Allstars
hero.subtitle: Cheerleading at TSV Plattenhardt: Team Spirit, Respect, and Community.

about.title: About
about.intro: The Infinity Cheer Allstars is the cheerleading program at TSV Plattenhardt. Under our guiding principle "WE ARE ONE", we combine athletic performance with team spirit, respect, and a strong sense of community.

program.title: Our Program
program.description: In our training sessions, we combine elements of cheerleading, acrobatics, gymnastics, dance, and strength training. Our teams regularly compete at state championships, representing TSV Plattenhardt.

values.title: Our Values
values.unity: Every athlete is part of the team: every role matters

teams.title: Our
teams.subtitle: Age appropriate development and seamless progression from beginners to competitive athletes.

sparkles.name: Infinity Sparkles
sparkles.description: Our development team for our youngest athletes. Here, cheerleading fundamentals are taught with joy and safety, building first movement experiences.

princesses.name: Infinity Princesses
princesses.description: Our first competition team. Technique, expression, and teamwork are continuously developed here.

divas.name: Infinity Divas
divas.description: A performance-oriented competition team where athletes learn more advanced elements and continue their athletic journey.

kingsQueens.name: Infinity Kings & Queens
kingsQueens.description: Our senior competition team trains at an advanced level.

achievements.title: Our
achievements.subtitle: Proud of our teams' accomplishments achieved with fairness, team spirit, and passion.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Impressions from training, performances, and competitions.

videos.title: Our
videos.subtitle: Experience our teams in action: training, competitions, and special moments.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Latest news, reports and stories from Infinity Cheer Allstars.
reports.errorLoading: Failed to load blog. Please try again later.

cta.title: Join
cta.subtitle: Trial training is available by prior registration. No previous experience required.

interested.title: Interested in Cheerleading?
interested.description: All you need to bring: sports clothes, motivation, and team spirit. Everything else we'll teach you step by step during training.

footer.description: The Infinity Cheer Allstars stand for team spirit, athletic dedication, and community. Under the motto "WE ARE ONE", we train from youth to senior level.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} Infinity Cheer Allstars, TSV Plattenhardt e.V. All rights reserved.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.info: These settings are saved locally in your browser and will persist on your next visit.

seo.description: Cheerleading in Filderstadt-Plattenhardt: Infinity Cheer Allstars at TSV Plattenhardt 1895 e.V. offers professional cheerleading training for all ages. From youth to competitive teams – WE ARE ONE.
seo.keywords: Cheerleading Plattenhardt, Cheerleading Filderstadt, TSV Plattenhardt, Infinity Cheer Allstars, Cheerleading Stuttgart, Cheerleading Baden-Württemberg, Cheerleading Training, Cheer Club Germany, CCVD, Cheerleading Germany, Youth Sports Filderstadt

localStorage.title: LocalStorage (Browser Storage)
localStorage.description: This website uses LocalStorage to store your settings (accessibility settings, language, cookie consent) locally in your browser. This data is not transmitted to a server and remains exclusively on your device.
localStorage.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in providing a user-friendly website).

googleFonts.title: Google Fonts
googleFonts.description: This website uses Google Fonts for displaying typefaces. When you visit our pages, your browser establishes a connection to Google servers, which may allow Google to recognize your IP address.
googleFonts.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in consistent visual presentation).
googleFonts.provider: Provider: Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This website does not use its own cookies. Google Fonts may set cookies for technical purposes. You can prevent the use of Google Fonts in our cookie settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

info.title: Right to Information (Art. 15 GDPR)
info.description: You can request confirmation as to whether we process your data.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
rectification.description: You can request the correction of incorrect data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure (Art. 17 GDPR)
erasure.description: You can request the deletion of your data.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction (Art. 18 GDPR)
restriction.description: You can request the restriction of processing.

dataPortability.title: Right to Data Portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
dataPortability.description: You can request your data in a machine-readable format.

objection.title: Right to Object (Art. 21 GDPR)
objection.description: You can object to the processing of your data.

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, please contact: info@icacheer.space

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.description: This website is hosted on GitHub Pages. When you visit our website, GitHub may record access data (IP address, date, time, pages accessed). For more information, please see GitHub's Privacy Policy.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in legal requirements or our services.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.subtitle: We respect your privacy
cookies.description: This website only uses essential local storage (localStorage) for accessibility settings. External services like Google Fonts are only loaded with your consent.
cookies.moreInfo: More information in our privacy policy

essential.title: Essential Storage
essential.description: Required for accessibility features (font size, contrast). These cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Services
functional.description: External services like Google Fonts for optimal display.

analytics.title: Analytics & Statistics
analytics.description: Currently not used. No analytics or tracking.

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us
banner.description: We only use essential storage for accessibility settings. External services like Google Fonts are only loaded with your consent.

essential.title: Essential Storage (LocalStorage)
essential.description: Stores your accessibility settings, language preference, and cookie choices locally in your browser. This data is not transmitted to any server.

googleFonts.title: Google Fonts
googleFonts.description: Loads fonts from Google servers for optimal typographic display. Your IP address may be transmitted to Google.
